edge: Ajay Devgn plays the character of Kaali Pratap Singh in the movie.

Vivek Oberoi essays the role of Dev Malhotra in the movie.
Esha Deol portrays Riya Thapar in the movie.

Malaika Arora appears as an item girl in the song 'Kaal Dhamaal'.
